Text: tested on windows xp sp3 only and works perfect if you are using vista or win 7 please leave a comment and let us know if it works :)
01-02 season was the best game of the series, i,ve spent so many hours. Thx for this!
Getting Errors when I try to extract mdf image
erm, When I'm trying to begin a game, it says "Aren't enuf space on harddrive to start an new game" Wtf have I dun wrong lol
found out:P Have to change the start settings of the game to windows 98/me-.- Then it works fine, thx:)
@bond sniper... how do you change the start settings?
I have the same problem to start the game because of the low system memory, help me how to fix this!

I know now how to fix the problem.
right click on shortcut on your desktop
go to properties 
go to compatibility
Set "Run this program in compatibility mode for" to Windows 98 / Windows Me
Apply
Run the game.
Enjoy, I will.
